io.netty.handler.codec.marshalling

类 DefaultUnmarshallerProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.handler.codec.marshalling.DefaultUnmarshallerProvider

    UnmarshallerProvider
    直接已知子类:
    ContextBoundUnmarshallerProvider

    public class DefaultUnmarshallerProvider
extends Object
implements UnmarshallerProvider
    Default implementation of UnmarshallerProvider which will just create a new Unmarshaller on every call to getUnmarshaller(ChannelHandlerContext)

    • 构造器概要
